snippet.title: Anime Arena: Infinite War - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
See more info on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1510600/Anime_Arena_Infinite_War

ANIME ARENA: INFINITE WAR is a unique action rpg game with survival elements. Zombies are everywhere and you are the only one who can defeat them! Take a cute anime girl under your control and fight against hordes of zombies. Earn money and gain experience to buy various upgrades and perks.
